<div align="center">
<h4>My .files</h4>

This repository includes my .configs, which I use in my daily routine on a machine with Hyprland.<br>
Feel free to dig and find something of your interest!<br>
:<zero-width space>)

</div>

```mint
 ╭─ Distro   -> Arch
 ├─ WM       -> Hyprland
 ├─ Editor   -> VSCode / NeoVim
 ├─ Terminal -> Kitty
 ├─ Shell    -> Fish
 ├─ Theme    -> Catppuccin Macchiato
 ├─ Icons    -> Catppuccin-SE
 ╰─ Font     -> JetBrains Mono
```
